Addin::Why Did You Stop Supporting XP/VistaHello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm happy to answer this for you. Grammarly strives to provide smooth and flawless user experience. For this reason, our company opted out of supporting older OS (like Windows XP and Windows Vista) that might hinder our service's functionality, thus impacting our users' impression from our service. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please note that you are most welcome to upgrade your OS to continue using our service. You can take advantage of Grammarly if you have Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 on your computer. Thank you for understanding. Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or comments. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}information_add-in_old_os_support_discountinued, information, addin
Addin::Why Grammarly Rescans My Document So OftenHello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for contacting Grammarly. I'm happy to answer this for you! Grammarly views a paragraph as the minimal unit of your text. Every time you make a change in the document, the whole paragraph where the change occurred needs to be re-checked. You can try splitting your document into smaller paragraphs and see if that helps. Checking time can also be affected by the number of paragraphs in your document. Every time you save a document, Grammarly needs to re-scan it to check if any of the paragraphs have changed. This is required because Microsoft Office and other add-ins you may have installed can access and change your document in-between the start and completion of the saving procedure. Because there is no way for us to control and/or detect any of these changes, we need to take a look at the whole document again to be sure it hasn't changed. I hope this explanation makes sense. Please let us know if we can assist you further. Kindly, {{ticket.assignee.name}}addin_rescanning_explanation, addin information
Addin::Word crashes / has stopped working / deletes text (Workaround)Hey {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for contacting Grammarly! I'm truly sorry to learn that you experienced this issue. We suggest that you try following these steps to resolve it: 1. Split your document into smaller parts if it is larger than ~ 50 pages 2. Try working on just one document at a time 3. Try disabling other add-ins as they sometimes can interfere with Grammarly 4. Disable your antivirus software If there's anything else we can do for you, please let us know. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}development system_bug addin_broken, addin addin_word_crashes_or_deletes_text_workaround
Assign to::Affiliate - About the ProgramHello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for your interest in Grammarly's affiliate program! Let me note that it works in a very simple way: you place either a tracking text link or a banner on your website (or email, e-book, social profile, etc.), and we pay you each time a referred user signs up for and installs Grammarly. Our unique commission structure gives you the chance to earn twice: $0.20 per free (no payment info required!) registration and $20 per premium upgrade. The program is live on two third-party affiliate networks: ShareASale and Commission Junction. We also have an in-house affiliate program powered by HasOffers, a tracking technology provider. You can join Grammarly's affiliate program here: http://www.grammarly.com/affiliates or contact Grammarly's Affiliate Team at affiliate_mktg@grammarly.com for more details. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}affiliate_program assign_to_outside affiliate_program_about, DoNotSurvey

If you consider the matter resolved following the refund of your payment, we kindly ask you to close the BBB case. Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or concerns you may have. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}bbb_case_reason_refund_denied, bbb
Billing:: StackCommerce Subscription Deactivated (Explain)

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly.


It appears that your Grammarly subscription was purchased through StackSocial/StackCommerce at the special discounted rate. This rate applied to the first subscription period, after which your plan was supposed to renew at $69.98 USD, if you had provided your payment details to Grammarly upon signing up with a voucher.

Unfortunately, we were unable to renew the subscription due to the lack of payment information. Your subscription associated with the email address ____ got downgraded to the free version.

If desired, you may purchase another subscription and your account will be automatically renewed. Upgrading to Grammarly Premium takes only a few simple steps:

  1. Log in to Grammarly.com with {{ticket.requester.email}}
  2. Click the "Premium" tab in the left-side pane of the page that will open
  3. Select your preferred plan
  4. Submit your billing information


Please let me know if you need any further assistance. I'm here to help!


Sincerely,

Billing::Asked to Delete Card Info

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your question.


For paying users, Grammarly will collect your payment information, which is required to complete a commercial transaction on the Site. We use this information to enable and fulfill your transaction. (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy)


To make sure you are not charged in the future, we suggest that you cancel your Grammarly subscription by following the instructions available at https://gram.ly/FXcX. We can also do this for you at your request. Once the pay period expires, your account will downgrade to the free version and the billing information will no longer be available to make other transactions; your billing profile will be closed. We guarantee that the billing information is stored securely by the payment processors. Grammarly does not store this information on our servers.


Please let us know if you would like assistance in canceling your account to prevent any future payments.


OR, for free users:


Since your subscription under {{ticket.requester.email}} was canceled and this account downgraded to the free version, the billing information is no longer available to make other transactions; your billing profile is closed. Additionally, we guarantee that the billing information is stored securely by the payment processors. Grammarly does not store this information on our servers.


Kindly,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Billing::Can I Request Refund After Upgrading?

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message!


You can cancel your subscription anytime to prevent future billing. However, canceling a subscription doesn't automatically issue a refund. For your reference, here's an excerpt from our Terms of Service and License Agreement:


"Except as may be expressly set forth herein, all Fees paid or accrued in connection with any Services are non-refundable, and Grammarly will not prorate any Fees paid for a subscription that is terminated before the end of its term."


I hope this answers your question, but please feel free to contact us with any further questions or concerns.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Billing::Discount Link Doesn't Work (Suggest to Upgrade in Incognito)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I am sorry that you are experiencing this issue.


Please rest assured that the upgrade link is valid and should work as expected.


We suggest that you try to upgrade by opening your browser in incognito mode:


To open an incognito window in Chrome:

1. Open Chrome.

2. Select New Incognito Window.


To start private browsing in Internet Explorer:


1. Use the Ctrl+Shift+P shortcut key

or

2. Click on Safety and select Private Browsing


To open a private window in Safari:

1. Choose File

2. Select New Private Window


To open a private window in Firefox:


1. Go to Firefox Menu.

2. Select New Private Window


Alternatively, you can right-click the promo link and select Open Link in Incognito/Private Window from the dropdown menu.


I hope this helps! Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you today.


Sincerely,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

I’ve double-checked with the billing department and they confirmed that no additional/extra payments were applied to your payment method. The extra charge you see on your statement appears to be a pre-authorization payment (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Authorization_hold) — it should drop off your statement within a maximum period of thirty days, depending on your bank. Billing::Double Billed (Queued Plan Confusion)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Customer Support.


I see that you have scheduled switching your account {{ticket.requester.email}} to the ____ plan once your current subscription period expires on _____. Please rest assured that you will not be charged for this queued plan before the stated date.


If you believe that there is an extra payment on your statement, perhaps you might have used another payment method or email address to create a Premium account?


Please let me know what this other email address is, or provide the following information to help us find any other subscription you might have:


  • last four digits of the credit card number you used for Grammarly
  • card network type (e.g., VISA)
  • the charge date
  • the charge amount
  • the reference number on your statement, if you see one (it should look similar to CO5DXT-8GCH, CO*5DXT-8GCH, or 5DXT-8GCH)


If you used PayPal, we'll need to know your PayPal email.


Also, could you please send us a scan or screenshot of the completed charge on your account statement? Please find the instructions on how to take a screenshot at https://www.take-a-screenshot.org/


Thank you,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly. I am happy to provide you with more information about the special offer you received.


The 50% discount rates are:


Monthly Subscription — $14.98/month

Quarterly Subscription — $29.98/three months

Annual Subscription — $69.98/one year


Please note that this is a one-time offer for users who wish to upgrade a free account for the first time. As such, the deal is valid for one subscription period only and can’t be applied to renewals. Any subscription purchased with this deal will renew at the following rates:


Monthly Subscription — $29.95/month

Quarterly Subscription — $59.95/three months

Annual Subscription — $139.95/one year


This offer is available to all new customers. If you have multiple accounts registered with Grammarly and received the promotion through a different email address, then this offer will apply only to that email address (which is connected to a “free/limited” account).


Please feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns you may have. We are committed to making your experience at Grammarly pleasant and rewarding.

Billing::Email Campaign: Renewal Price Confusion (Explain)

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly.


I am very sorry for the misunderstanding. My name is {{ticket.assignee.name}}, and I would like to clear up the confusion and take a moment to explain why you have been charged $____ USD.


When you subscribed at the rate of $___ USD on ____, this was a one-time offer for users who wished to upgrade a free account for the first time. As such, the deal was valid for one subscription period only; your subscription was set to renew at the following rates:


Monthly Subscription — $29.95/month

Quarterly Subscription — $59.95/three months

Annual Subscription — $139.95/one year


Upon subscribing, you agreed to the renewal rate of $___ USD unless you canceled your subscription prior to the payment date.


I hope this clarifies the issue! We apologize for any misunderstanding you may have had regarding our payment policy.


If you do not wish to continue using Grammarly Premium, then I can assist you with canceling your future scheduled payments. You can also cancel your subscription yourself — simply log in to your account at Grammarly.com, click the “Manage subscription” link at https://account.grammarly.com/subscription, then select Cancel Subscription and click Confirm cancellation.


Please feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns you may have. We are committed to making your experience at Grammarly pleasant and rewarding.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

information_email_campaign, billing_email_campaign_renewal_price_confusion_explain, billing information

Billing::How To::Change Billing/Renewal Date (Suggest to Cancel Subscription)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting us here at Grammarly. I'm happy to answer your question!


If you need to change your billing date:


1. Cancel your current billing cycle to prevent future billing. Once your current subscription period expires, your account will downgrade to the free version of Grammarly. Please follow the instructions available at https://gram.ly/FXcX


2. Resubscribe to Premium on the day you'd like to be charged. You will then be charged on or around this day each month.


Note: Your account will need to remain free/limited until the date you'd like the new billing to start.


If there's an issue with your payment method, please note that we offer a 13-day grace period during which we'll attempt to renew your subscription. If your renewal payment is not processed within the stated time frame, your subscription will be canceled with no further charges applied. You'll still be able to use the free version of Grammarly after the cancelation.


I hope this information helps, but please feel free to contact us with any further questions or comments.


Sincerely,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

billing_how_to_change_billing_renewal_date_suggest_to_cancel_subscription, billing information subscription

The credit card issuer simply links both the old card number and your new one to the account, so any refunds to the canceled card will still be credited to the right place. Billing::Payment Difficulties - 1 Dollar ChargeHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for reaching out. The $1 charge is the minimum charge we can apply against a card for validation of both the card and our ability to transact against it for your subscription. It is only temporary and isn't actually withdrawn, so it will appear as a “Pending” transaction before eventually going away or being replaced by the actual amount of your Grammarly Premium subscription. I hope this clarifies the matter! Unfortunately, it appears that your payment didn’t go through. We suggest that you try upgrading again or use PayPal as an alternative payment method. To resolve this, please try changing your payment information by opening your browser in Incognito mode. To open an incognito window in Chrome: 1. Open Chrome. 2. Select New Incognito Window. To start private browsing in Internet Explorer: 1. Use the Ctrl+Shift+P shortcut key or 2. Click on Safety and select Private Browsing To open a private window in Safari: 1. Choose File 2. Select New Private Window To open a private window in Firefox: 1. Go to Firefox Menu. 2. Select New Private Window I hope this helps, but please don't hesitate to contact us with any further questions or comments. Thanks for your message! Let me look into this for you.

If you have multiple accounts registered with Grammarly and received the promotion through a different email address, then this offer will apply only to that email address (which is connected to a “free/limited” account). I see that the offer in question was sent to _____, which is currently associated with a free/limited account.

As an exception, I have refunded $__ USD to make it a subscription plan at the rate of $__ USD. Please note that it may take up to 10 business days for the refund to appear on your credit card statement, depending on your bank. If you paid with PayPal, the refund should post to your account within a maximum period of 5 business days.

Note: This change will not be reflected in your Subscription settings at https://account.grammarly.com/subscription. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Your account associated with {{ticket.requester.email}} is paid until _____, when it will automatically renew at $_____ USD unless canceled.

Additionally, we suggest that you remove your free account under ___ to avoid this confusion in the future. To learn how to delete your free Grammarly account, please visit this page: https://gram.ly/HCVF

Please let me know if you have any additional questions. We're here to help!


Regards,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

Billing::Purchased and Charged Again (Unauthorized Renewal - Explain)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly! I'm happy to clarify this for you.


Please note that Grammarly is currently set to “recurring payment” cycles.


Your subscription under {{ticket.requester.email}} was set to renew at the rates stated when you signed up because it was not canceled before the end of the billing period. For your reference, here’s an excerpt from our Terms of Service:


“To ensure uninterrupted service, all subscriptions to the Site, Software and Services are renewed automatically. You hereby authorize Grammarly to charge subscription Fees for the renewal period to the credit card or PayPal® account on file.”


You’re welcome to review the Fees, payment, and trial memberships section of our Terms of Service for more details. We apologize for any misunderstanding you may have had with our payment policy.


If you do not wish to continue using Grammarly Premium moving forward, then I can assist you with canceling any future payments, or you may do so yourself by following the instructions provided here.


Please do not hesitate to contact us with any future questions or concerns you might have.


Sincerely,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Billing::Refund - Why Meet Halfway (Explain){{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for getting back to us. Unfortunately, we are unable to honor your request for a full refund. As stated in our Terms of Service and License Agreement (https://grammarly.com/terms), all Fees paid or accrued in connection with any Services are non-refundable. Asking users to agree to the Terms Of Service and License Agreement upon sign-up is a standard industry practice on websites such as Grammarly. As noted in the previous message, we've made an exception and refunded ____ of your renewal payments for our services as a courtesy. Unfortunately, we're unable to extend this courtesy even further and refund all of your renewal payments for Grammarly Premium. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. You are a valued customer, and we hope to serve you again in the future. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}billing, billing_refund_why_meet_halfway_explain
Billing::Refund Denied - No Proration

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly!


Unfortunately, Grammarly does not refund any unused portion from your original subscription period. For your reference, here is an excerpt from our Terms of Service and License Agreement (http://www.grammarly.com/terms.php#billing):


“All Fees paid or accrued in connection with any Service are non-refundable. Except as may be expressly set forth herein, Grammarly will not prorate any Fees paid for a subscription that is terminated before the end of its term.”


I have confirmed that your subscription associated with the email address {{ticket.requester.email}} has been canceled. Canceling a subscription cancels all future scheduled payments, but you will still have access to Grammarly for the remaining usage period covered by your initial payment until _____.


OR


If you do not wish to continue using Grammarly Premium, then I can assist you with canceling your future scheduled payments. You can also cancel your subscription yourself — simply log in to your account at Grammarly.com, click the Subscription tab at https://account.grammarly.com, then select Cancel Subscription.


Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. We hope to serve you again in the future.


Sincerely,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Billing::Refund Denied::Original::Chargeback Already Filed (In Progress)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for reaching out!


I see that you filed a chargeback with your bank, which resulted in deactivation of your Premium subscription as per our Terms of Service and License Agreement (https://grammarly.com/terms). Please see an excerpt from the Agreement below:


"Grammarly may deny you access to all or any part of the Services or terminate your account with or without prior notice if you engage in any conduct or activities that Grammarly determines, in its sole discretion, violate this Agreement or the rights of Grammarly or any third party, or is otherwise inappropriate."


Please note that we can't refund your payment until this case is reviewed by your credit card issuer. We suggest that you wait for the resolution of the dispute case — your bank should notify you when it’s complete.


I am going to put this support ticket on hold and get back to you as soon as I hear back on the resolution of the chargeback case. Normally this takes up to 2-4 weeks.


Thank you for your patience and understanding!


Sincerely,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Billing::Refund in US DollarsHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for sharing your concerns with us. I know it can be confusing. I’m happy to help straighten this out for you. Grammarly works exclusively in U.S. dollars. The difference you see reflected in your statement corresponds with a change in the exchange rate between the times of charge and refund. Unfortunately, it is beyond our capabilities to track and adjust for these shifts. I apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused you. Please let me know if you have any further questions. Billing::Refund Issued - Confirm (Voided, Still Not Received) - ExplainHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for your updated message! Please note that when a payment transaction is voided, the original authorization should disappear from the bank statement in 1-2 business days. Some banks don't recognize void requests immediately. It is possible that after we've issued the void, you will still see the pending charge. If this happens, we suggest you contact your bank; the bank should be able to see the void request and update your bank statement accordingly. Please contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. We hope to serve you again in the future. When you subscribed at the rate of $___ USD on ____, this was a one-time offer for users who wished to upgrade a free account for the first time. As such, the deal was valid for one subscription period only and can’t be applied to renewals.


Your subscription is set to renew at the following rates:


Monthly Subscription — $29.95/month

Quarterly Subscription — $59.95/three months

Annual Subscription — $139.95/one year


Unfortunately, we’re not currently running any additional promotions on Grammarly Premium, so we cannot provide you with a new discount at the moment.


If you choose not to renew your current subscription, it’s possible that you will see other offers through email promos at some point in the future.

Billing::Request to Pay for the Annual Plan Monthly (Deny)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm happy to answer this for you. Annual subscriptions are billed as one annual payment and can’t be split into smaller installments. If you would prefer to pay monthly, we do offer a monthly subscription. However, with a monthly plan you’ll miss out on the overall savings offered by the annual plan. The current rates (grammarly.com/premium) are as follows: Monthly Subscription — $29.95/month Quarterly Subscription — $59.95/three months* Annual Subscription — $139.95/one year* *billed as one payment in US dollars Please see our billing policy for more details at grammarly.com/terms#billing. Should you have any further questions, please let me know. Kind regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}billing_asked_to_pay_monthly_for_annual, billing unclear_payment_page subscription_unclear_pricing
Billing::Sales Tax Not Included (Explain)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for reaching out! I'm happy to answer this for you. Grammarly does not charge a sales tax. You should not incur any additional charges. Please note that the subscription rates are stated in U.S. dollars. We work exclusively in U.S. dollars, and any difference you may see on your statement reflects the exchange rate between your local currency and the U.S. dollar on the date of the charge, that is if you reside outside of the U.S. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any further questions or concerns you might have. Billing::Unable to Pay with PayPal BalanceHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for your message! According to PayPal, the buyer is able to use their balance when making a purchase using PayPal. The PayPal balance is always the default Payment method when making a payment. Even though the balance is used, an alternate payment method must be on file for the billing agreement to process. If you don’t have a credit card to provide, you’ll need to reach out to PayPal to see if they can change these settings for you. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do from our end about this. Many apologies for the inconvenience. Should you have any further questions, just let me know. We’re here to help! Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}billing billing_payment_difficulties, billing_unable_to_pay_with_paypal_balance
Billing::Upgrade Account via Phone (Decline)

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly. I'm happy to answer this for you!


Unfortunately, we do not accept billing information over the phone at this time. Grammarly takes privacy very seriously, which is why we use PCI-compliant online payment providers. This ensures secure and fast payments without the need to go through extra time-consuming security steps.


You can upgrade to Grammarly Premium in a few simple steps:


  1. Log in to Grammarly.com with your email address {{ticket.requester.email}} and password
  2. Click the "Premium" tab in the left-side pane of the Editor
  3. Select your preferred plan and submit your billing information.


Please let me know if you need any further assistance.


Sincerely,

Billing::Which Card Will the Refund Go To?Hey {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, The refund will be applied to the card that was charged for our services. Billing::Why New Card Was Charged? (Account Updater Program)Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly. My name is {{ticket.assignee.name}}, and I’m happy to assist you with this! We apologize for any confusion that the recent charge you contacted us about has caused. Here is an explanation of why you were charged: Grammarly uses a third-party PCI-compliant credit card processor to handle payment processing and keep billing information up to date. If you are seeing charges on a new card that you haven't added to your Grammarly account, your financial institution has automatically updated this information for us to attempt the transaction. Financial institutions do this to ensure that accounts using recurring payments remain in good standing when a new card is issued. In some cases, your financial institution may also allow recurring charges to continue on an expired card. Such programs are the Visa® Account Updater and MasterCard® Automatic Billing Updater programs. American Express® has a recurring billing program similar to the Visa Account Updater and MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater programs. This program requires no action on our part. If you have any concerns about this process and would like to verify your issuing bank's participation in the programs, please contact your credit card company. I hope this clarifies the matter for you. And we once again apologize for any confusion. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}billing, billing_why_charged_to_new_card
Billing::Why No Discount For Me?

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message, and good question about discounts. Grammarly Premium is offered at a very competitive rate for the value it provides, although we do offer seasonal or promotional discounts to a limited number of our email subscribers from time to time. We can’t disclose in advance when these promos run, but we encourage you to stay tuned and keep an eye out for our special offer emails.


Our current Premium rates (grammarly.com/pricing) are as follows:


Monthly Subscription — $29.95/month

Quarterly Subscription — $59.95/three months*

Annual Subscription — $139.95/one year*


*billed as one payment


Grammarly’s billing policy is viewable at grammarly.com/terms.php#billing.


Please feel free to contact us with any further questions or concerns.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::About ExtensionHey {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for writing in today. I'm happy to answer this for you! Grammarly's browser extension for Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge integrates contextual spelling and grammar check, thesaurus, and dictionary directly into your favorite websites. Grammarly's browser extension will help you find and fix contextual spelling mistakes, such as the use of there-their-they’re, allowed-aloud, two-too and many others. Grammarly will also detect some basic grammar mistakes, such as punctuation, article use, capitalization and word misuses. You can learn more about the extension in the article below: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000091592 Hope this helps! Best wishes, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin information, browser_plugin_about

Browser Plugin::Chrome::Beta Version Not SupportedHi {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thank you for your patience! The Grammarly extension supports officially released browser versions only. Since Chrome ___ is a beta version, our extension doesn't work in it by design. I hope this clarifies the matter. If there's anything else we can do for you, just let us know. We apologize for any inconvenience. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_beta_version_not_supported
Browser Plugin::Chrome::Corrections Disappear Too Soon/Cards Blink (TS-3118)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Customer Support! I'm sorry that you're experiencing this issue. I'd like to get additional information from you to help the development team investigate this case more thoroughly. Could you please provide the URL of the website where you're experiencing this issue? Does the issue occur with any text that you check or just some specific one? If you're using the Boomerang extension, would you mind disabling it to see if that resolves the issue? If you're not using Boomerang, please disable any other extensions that you installed in Chrome and record a video showing the issue you're experiencing. You can help us understand and resolve this by using Monosnap (https://www.monosnap.com/) or your preferred video recording tool (even a smartphone video will work!). Please provide us with the link to the video, and I'll forward it to our development team. Thank you for your time and help, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin browser_plugin_chrome development, browser_plugin_corrections_disappear_too_soon_ts3118

Browser Plugin::Chrome::Extension Disappears (TS-3265)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm sorry to hear about this issue.


To troubleshoot this, please follow the instructions below:


1. Go to chrome:help and update your Google Chrome browser to its latest version.


2. Reinstall the Grammarly extension for Chrome. It's a couple of simple steps:


- In Chrome, go to chrome:extensions

- Toggle the switch in the Grammarly extension section to disable this product or click Remove to delete the extension from your browser


3. Download the latest version at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-spell-checker-g/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact us should you need any further assistance. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_extension_disappears, development system_bug
Browser Plugin::Chrome::G Icon Shows When Printing Google Docs

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue.


Our technical team is already aware of the problem you reported, but unfortunately, we don’t currently have a quick fix. I can’t provide you with an estimated timeframe right now because the developers need some time to analyze the cause of the issue, but please rest assured that we won’t forget about it.

In the meantime, we suggest that you download your Google Docs document to your computer and then print it using your preferred text editor.

To download a Google Docs document, please do the following:

  1. On your computer, open the Google Docs home screen
  2. Open a document
  3. At the top, click File > Download as
  4. Choose a file type. The file will download onto your computer


I hope this helps, and we apologize for any inconvenience. Please feel free to contact us with any further questions or comments you may have.


Kindly,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

browser_plugin_chrome browser_plugin_g_icon_shows_when_printing_google_docs, browser_plugin development_sent_to_development development gdocs
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Disable Extension by Default

Hey {{ticket.requester.name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm happy to answer this for you.


To disable the Grammarly extension by default, please right-click the G icon on the Chrome toolbar. Then, please hover over This Can Read and Change Site Data and check the box next to "When You Click the Extension."


​
​


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact us with any questions or comments you may have. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_chrome development, browser_plugin_chrome_disable_extension_by_default
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Disable on a Certain WebsiteHey {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thanks for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm happy to answer this for you. To disable the Grammarly extension for certain websites, please click the G icon on the Chrome toolbar and toggle "Check Grammar and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms via Double Clicks" off. I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact us with any questions or comments you may have. We apologize for any inconvenience. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_disable_on_a_website
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Disable the Login ReminderHi {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thank you for reaching out. We apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused. To disable the reminder, please hover over the green dot in the text field, and select “Don’t show this again” in the pop-up window that opens. Please also note that if you choose to log in to Grammarly, you can then disable the Grammarly browser extension for certain websites. To do so, please click the G icon on the Chrome toolbar and toggle "Check Grammar and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms via Double Clicks" off. I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact us with any questions or comments you may have. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_how_to_disable_login_reminder
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To InstallHi {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support. I'm happy to answer this for you! To add the Grammarly's browser extension to your Chrome browser, please visit this page: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-spell-checker-g/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen Once you have downloaded and installed the Grammarly extension for Chrome, you should be able to use it as you write online. Simply click on the "G" button in the bottom right-hand corner of a text field, and Grammarly will show mistakes in the Editor window that opens automatically. Also, you can hover over a highlighted mistake and apply a correction suggested by Grammarly on the card that will appear. Finally, you can log in to your account {{ticket.requester.email}} at https://app.grammarly.com/ and proofread your writing by copying and uploading it to the online Grammarly Editor. For more information on how the extension works, please check this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000091592 I hope this helps! Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or comments. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_install_how_to
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How to Reinstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue.


I would suggest you reinstall the extension to resolve this. It’s a couple of simple steps:


  1. Open your Chrome browser
  2. Go to chrome:extensions
  3. Click Remove in the Grammarly for Chrome section
  4. Download the latest version at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-spell-checker-g/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Reset Browser Settings + Reinstall Extension

Dear {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for reaching out!


To resolve the issue, you will need to reset Chrome as described in this article: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/3296214?hl=en


After the reset has been completed, please install Grammarly for Chrome again:


1. Open your Chrome browser

2. Download the latest version at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-spell-checker-g/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen


Note: Be sure to back up your saved passwords first!


I hope this helps! Please feel free to contact me with any questions or comments.


Kindly,

Could you please open your Chrome browser, go to chrome:extensions and send us a screenshot of that window? You can find more information on how to take a screenshot at http://take-a-screenshot.org/. Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Uninstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.name}},


We apologize that Grammarly did not perform for you as expected.


To disable or uninstall the Grammarly extension for Chrome, please do the following:


1. Open your Chrome browser

2. Copy-paste this line into your address bar and press Enter:


chrome:extensions


3. Click Remove in the Grammarly for Chrome section


Alternatively, you can right-click the Grammarly icon in your browser's toolbar and select Remove from Chrome..., then click Remove to confirm the deletion.


Should you have any additional questions or comments, please let me know.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_uninstall
Browser Plugin::Chrome::How To Uninstall - Step 2

Hi {{ticket.requester.name}},


I'm sorry that you are experiencing this issue.


If my previous instructions didn't help, I suggest you go to chrome:settings/syncSetup and check if the extensions sync is enabled in Chrome.


Here is a picture of what it will look like:


699px, 260px ​


If it's enabled, please:


1. Disable extensions sync

2. Delete the extension

3. Enable extensions sync


If you don't have the extensions sync enabled, you can delete the Grammarly extension this way:


1. In My PC/This PC, open the following location %LocalAppData%\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default\extensions, then delete the folder "kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen" that you'll find there


2. Restart Chrome


I hope this helps!


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_chrome, browser_plugin_chrome_uninstall browser_plugin_chrome_uninstall_2
Browser Plugin::Chrome::It Logs Out (TS-3812)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing this issue.


We suggest that you follow the instructions below to sign in successfully:

  1. Open Chrome
  2. Copy-paste the following text into your browser's address bar: chrome:settings/siteData
  3. Type grammarly in the Search cookies field
  4. Click Remove all Shown


Additionally, please do the following:

  1. Copy/paste this line into your address field in Chrome chrome:settings/content/cookies and press Enter
  2. Enable Allow sites to save and read cookies data (recommended)
  3. Disable Block third-party cookies
  4. Disable Keep local data only until you quit your browser
  5. Log in to Grammarly at https://app.grammarly.com and restart your browser


If you'd prefer not to enable cookies in Chrome, you can add [*.]grammarly.com to the list of exceptions in the Allow section.


We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience. Should you need any further assistance, please let us know.


Best wishes,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_chrome development, browser_plugin_logout_issue_chrome
Browser Plugin::Chrome::Key Features Are Missing/X or Wi-Fi Icon (TS-2784)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I'm happy to assist you today.


To resolve this, please make sure you're logged in to your Grammarly account {{ticket.requester.email}} at https://app.grammarly.com.

If the issue persists even though you're logged in to Grammarly, please enable your browser's cookies by following the instructions below:


  1. Copy/paste this line into your address field in Chrome: chrome:settings/content/cookies
  2. Configure your Cookies settings as shown below:



  3. Log in to your Grammarly account at https://app.grammarly.com.


I hope this helps, but please let me know if I can assist you further. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

Browser Plugin::Chrome::Suggestion Cards Blink/Boomerang Incompatibility (FT-3928)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for your message! I'm truly sorry you're experiencing this issue. Unfortunately, the Grammarly extension for Chrome is incompatible with Boomerang at this time. We suggest you disable Boomerang in Gmail. Alternatively, you can check the text of your emails at https://app.grammarly.com/ I know that it's definitely not an ideal workaround, but please rest assured that the technical team is aware of the problem and is currently working on it. However, this won't be a quick fix and I can't provide you with an estimated timeframe, as the developers need some time to analyze the cause of this issue. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns. To add the Grammarly's free extension to your browser, please follow the links below: Grammarly for Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/grammarly-spell-checker-g/kbfnbcaeplbcioakkpcpgfkobkghlhen Grammarly for Safari: https://extensions.apple.com/details/?id=com.safari.grammarlyspellcheckergrammarchecker87677a2c52b84ad3a151a4a72f5bd3c4-W8F64X92K3 Grammarly Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/grammarly-1/ Grammarly for Edge: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/grammarly-for-microsoft-edge/9p59wxtbhzzm We hope you'll enjoy it! Browser Plugin::Doesn't Check Subject Line on GmailHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for your message! At this time, Grammarly's extension doesn't check the subject line of emails being composed in Gmail. As a workaround, we suggest that you copy the subject line and paste it into the body of the email for Grammarly to check it, and then copy the text back to the subject line. We apologize if this may cause any inconvenience for you. Should you need any further assistance, please let us know. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_doesnt_check_subject_line_on_gmail
Browser Plugin::Doesn't Work on Zoho (Suggest to Use Plain Text Mode)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Customer Support! Our technical team is aware of the problem you reported, but unfortunately, we don’t currently have a quick fix. I can’t provide you with an estimated timeframe right now because the developers need some time to analyze the cause of the issue, but please rest assured that we won’t forget about it. As a workaround, we suggest that you use Grammarly on Zoho in plain text mode. To switch to plain text mode, click "Plain text" in the right corner of the compose window. This will set your Zoho to plain text mode by default and all emails will be composed in plain text until you choose to switch back to rich text mode. If you have any other questions, just let me know and I’ll be happy to help. We apologize for any inconvenience. Regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, donotsurvey browser_plugin_doesnt_work_on_zoho_suggest_to_use_plain_text_mode
Browser Plugin::Edge::Ask to Disable All Other Extensions

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your patience while we were looking into this.

We recommend disabling other extensions that you might be using in Microsoft Edge to see if the issue reproduces with all other extensions except Grammarly disabled.

To disable other extensions, please open your Edge browser > press Alt + X keys > click Extensions, and disable all extensions except Grammarly.


Please let me know how it goes so we can look into this further for you, if necessary.


Thank you and many apologies for the inconvenience,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::Edge::How To Install

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support. I'm happy to answer this for you!


To add Grammarly's browser extension to Microsoft Edge, please visit this page:


https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/grammarly-for-microsoft-edge/9p59wxtbhzzm


Once you’ve added the extension to your browser, click Turn it on to enable the checking:


​
​​


After you have downloaded and installed the Grammarly extension for Edge, you should be able to use it as you write online. Simply click on the "G" button in the bottom right-hand corner of a text field, and Grammarly will show mistakes in the Editor window that opens automatically. Also, you can hover over a highlighted mistake and apply a correction suggested by Grammarly on the card that will appear. Finally, you can log in to your account with your username ({{ticket.requester.email}}) and password at https://app.grammarly.com/ and proofread your writing by copying and uploading it to the online Grammarly Editor.


For more information on how the Grammarly extension works, please check this article:


https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000091592


Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or comments.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_edge, browser_plugin_edge_install_how_to
Browser Plugin::Edge::How to Reinstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support!


I would suggest you reinstall the extension to resolve this issue. It’s a couple of simple steps:


  1. Open your Edge browser
  2. Go to your browser's menu by clicking the three dots in its toolbar and select Extensions
  3. Select Grammarly for Microsoft Edge, then click Uninstall
  4. Download the latest version at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/grammarly-for-microsoft-edge/9p59wxtbhzzm


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_edge, browser_plugin_edge_reinstall_how_to
Browser Plugin::Edge::How To Reset Browser Settings + Reinstall Extension

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message!


To resolve the issue, we suggest that you reset Microsoft Edge by following the steps described in the article: http://www.thewindowsclub.com/reset-microsoft-edge-browser-to-default-settings-in-windows-10


After the reset has been completed, please install Grammarly for Microsoft Edge again:


1. Open your Edge browser

2. Visit https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/grammarly-for-microsoft-edge/9p59wxtbhzzm to download the latest version of Grammarly for Edge


Note: Be sure to back up your saved passwords first!


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments. We apologize for the inconvenience.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::Edge::How To UninstallHi {{ticket.requester.name}}, We apologize that Grammarly did not perform for you as expected. To disable or uninstall the Grammarly extension for Microsoft Edge, please do the following: 1. Open your Edge browser 2. Click on the three dots indicating your browser's menu, then choose Extensions 3. Click on Grammarly for Microsoft Edge, then select Uninstall in the drop-down menu that will show. Should you have any additional questions or comments, please let me know. We hope to see you again soon! Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_edge, browser_plugin_edge_uninstall
Browser Plugin::Edge::It Logs Out

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing this issue.


Please follow these instructions to resolve this:


1. In Edge, press Alt + X, then select Settings
2. Open the Privacy & Security tab
3. In the Clear Browsing Data section, click Choose what to clear
4. Disable the Always clear this when I close the browser option


I hope this helps, but please let us know if you need any further assistance. We apologize for the inconvenience.


Best wishes,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_edge, browser_plugin_logout_issue_edge
Browser Plugin::Edge::Pop-up Editor Disabled on Gmail

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support.


Unfortunately, the pop-up editor doesn't currently work on Gmail and a few other websites due to incompatibility issues with our extension and the Edge browser.


As a workaround, we suggest using Firefox, Chrome or Safari. To add the Grammarly extension to another browser, please follow the instructions in the relevant section here.


Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or comments. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_edge, browser_plugin_edge_popup_editor_doesnt_work_on_gmail_and_some_other_websites
Browser Plugin::Exclude Other Languages from Checking (No)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm happy to assist you today. Unfortunately, the option to exclude other languages from checking is not available at this time, although it's definitely on our wishlist. As a workaround, you can disable the Grammarly extension for websites where you normally type in any other language but English. If this option works for you, please check this article https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000091612. If there's anything else we can do for you, please let me know. Browser Plugin::Extension Broken - Working to Resolve It Later + Close (Sent to Devs)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Customer Support!

Our technical team is already aware of the problem you reported, but unfortunately, we don’t currently have a quick fix. I can’t provide you with an estimated timeframe right now because the developers need some time to analyze the cause of the issue, but please rest assured that we won’t forget about it.

In the meantime, you can disable the Grammarly extension for the website(s) in question.

Chrome:

To do that in Chrome, please click the G icon on the Chrome toolbar and toggle "Check Grammar and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms via Double Clicks" off.

Firefox:

To disable the extension for a certain website in Firefox, please click the G icon on the Firefox toolbar and toggle the switches next to "Check Grammar and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms" off.

Safari:

To disable our Safari extension for certain websites, please click the G icon on the Safari toolbar and toggle "Check Grammar and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms via Double Clicks" off.


OR


In the meantime, we suggest you use our online Grammarly Editor at https://app.grammarly.com or the Grammarly extension for a different browser. Also at your disposal: Grammarly for Microsoft Office (available to Windows OS users).

I’m going to close this case, but if you have more information regarding this issue, please reply to this email and the case will be re-opened for further investigation. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Kind regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin development, development_sent_to_development extension_broken_sent_to_devs

To disable other extensions, please open your Firefox browser > сlick Tools > Add-ons > Extensions and disable all extensions except Grammarly.

browser_plugin development browser_plugin_firefox, browser_plugin_ask_to_disable_all_other_extensions_firefox
Browser Plugin::Firefox::How To Disable on a Certain WebsiteHey {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thanks for contacting Grammarly Support! To disable the Grammarly extension for certain websites, please click the G icon on the Firefox toolbar and toggle the switches next to "Check Grammarly and Spelling" and "Show Definitions and Synonyms" off. I hope this helps, but let me know if you have any further questions or comments. Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_firefox, browser_plugin_firefox_disable_on_a_website
Browser Plugin::Firefox::How To InstallHi {{ticket.requester.name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support! To add Grammarly's browser extension to your Firefox browser, please visit this page: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/grammarly-1/ Once you have downloaded and installed the Grammarly extension for Firefox, you should be able to use it as you write online. Simply click on the "G" button in the bottom right-hand corner of a text field, and Grammarly will show mistakes in the Editor window that opens automatically. Also, you can hover over a highlighted mistake and apply a correction suggested by Grammarly on the card that will appear. Finally, you can log in to your account {{ticket.requester.email}} at https://app.grammarly.com/ and proofread your writing by copying and uploading it to the online Grammarly’s Editor. To learn more about the extension, please check this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000091592 Please feel free to contact us with any additional questions or comments. We're here to help! Best regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_firefox, browser_plugin_firefox_install_how_to
Browser Plugin::Firefox::How to Reinstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support!


I would suggest you reinstall the extension in order to resolve this issue. It’s a couple of simple steps:


  1. Open your Firefox browser
  2. Click Tools > Add-ons > Extensions
  3. Click Remove to uninstall the plugin
  4. Restart the browser
  5. Download the latest version at https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/grammarly-1/


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_firefox, browser_plugin_firefox_reinstall_how_to
Browser Plugin::Firefox::How To Reset Browser Settings + Reinstall Extension

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message!


To resolve this issue, you will need to reset Firefox as described in this article:


https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/refresh-firefox-reset-add-ons-and-settings


After the reset has been completed, please install Grammarly for Firefox again:


1. Open your Firefox browser


2. Visit https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/grammarly-1/ to download the latest version


Note: Be sure to back up your saved passwords first!


I hope this helps, but please let us know if you need any further assistance. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Best regards,

Browser Plugin::Firefox::How To Uninstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.name}},


We apologize that Grammarly did not perform for you as expected.


To disable or uninstall the Grammarly extension for Firefox, please follow these steps:


  1. Open your Firefox browser.
  2. Paste this line into the address bar: about:addons
  3. Click Disable to temporarily disable the plugin, or if you'd like to uninstall the extension, click Remove
  4. Restart the browser


I hope this helps! Should you need any further assistance, please let me know.


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin, browser_plugin_firefox, browser_plugin_firefox_uninstall
Browser Plugin::Firefox::It Logs Out (TS-2329)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing this issue.


Please follow these instructions to ensure that cookies are enabled in your browser:

  1. Copy/paste this line into your browser's address field: about:preferences#privacy
  2. If you have Content Blocking set to Custom, please make sure there is no check mark next to Cookies
  3. In the Cookies and Site Data section, unselect Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed


Alternatively, you can add the following exception in the Manage Permissions section: https://grammarly.com

Then, please restart Firefox to apply the changes.


I hope this helps, but please let us know if you need any further assistance. We apologize for the inconvenience.


Best wishes,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_firefox development, browser_plugin_logout_issue_firefox

Browser Plugin::Firefox::Misplaced Underlines (TS-2830)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing this issue.

Our technical team is aware of the problem you reported, but unfortunately, we don’t currently have a quick fix. I can’t provide you with an estimated timeframe right now because the developers need some time to analyze the cause of the issue, but please rest assured that we won’t forget about it.

In the meantime, I recommend that you clear your browser's cache as described below:

  • Copy-paste the following text into Firefox address bar: about:preferences#privacy
  • Locate Cookies and Site Data section and click Clear Data...
  • Select Cached Web Content
  • Click Clear


I hope this helps, but please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you. Many apologies for the inconvenience!


Best regards,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::How To::Enable Definitions and Synonyms

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support. I'm happy to answer this for you!


To enable the definitions and synonyms feature, click the Grammarly icon in your browser's toolbar and toggle the switch next to Show Definitions and Synonyms via Double-Clicks on.


If you'd like to learn more about this feature, please visit https://www.grammarly.com/blog/how-to-learn-new-words-while-writing/


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments.


Kindly,

It will also detect some basic grammar mistakes, such as punctuation, article use, capitalization and word misuses. Browser Plugin::Limitations on Facebook (Not in Chat & Comment Replies)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for contacting Grammarly! In answer to your question: the Grammarly extension works with messages and the status update box on Facebook. Unfortunately, the Grammarly extension does not check your writing in the chat or notes field at this time. To use the Grammarly extension with Messages on Facebook, please go to https://www.facebook.com/messages and open any message. You should see the Grammarly icon in the bottom right corner there right away. I hope this helps! Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. Browser Plugin::More Information (Request)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I'm happy to look into this for you.


First, could you please tell if you tried restarting your browser? Simply close your browser using the Cmd + Q keys (on macOS) or by pressing Alt+F4 (on Windows OS) and open it again. If that doesn't help, try rebooting your computer and see if the issue persists then.


If the issue does persist afterward, could you please tell us:


1) What browser and version you are using?

2) What is your computer's OS (operating system)?

3) Do you see a green G button in the bottom right corner of the field where you are typing?

4) Can you check whether your plugin is enabled/disabled?


If your browser is Chrome:

Please go to chrome:extensions and check that the Enabled box is checked.


If your browser is Firefox:

Click Tools > Add-ons > Extensions and ensure it's enabled (if it is, the Disable button will appear as an option).


If your browser is Safari:

Click Safari tab > Preferences..., Click Extensions, then check that the plugin is Enabled.


If you're using Edge:

Click your browser's menu > Extensions > Grammarly for Microsoft Edge, then ensure that the switch is toggled to On.


Thank you for your time and help,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_request_more_information
Browser Plugin::No G Icon on Unknown Website

Hey {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for reaching out.


To check whether a text field on your website is compatible with Grammarly, please follow this link:

https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000090392


Please also note that our extension works only in a non-read-only text area, a non-read-only content editable, and an iframe with a content editable body. There are exceptions and conditions to this rule; for example, Draft.js fields are not supported either.


If Grammarly doesn’t work on your website, you can always use the Online Editor at https://app.grammarly.com.


I hope this helps, but please don’t hesitate to contact me for any further assistance. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Best wishes,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin information development, browser_plugin_no_G_icon_on_unknown_website
Browser Plugin::No icon in Facebook Messages (Instructions)Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for your message! I'm happy to assist you today. To get the Grammarly extension to work with messages on Facebook, please follow these instructions: 1. Make sure the Grammarly extension is installed in your _______ browser. If you're not sure it's installed, please download it from __________ and run the downloaded installation file. 2. Go to Facebook and open the full view of your Messages there, as the Grammarly extension does not work from within the minimized message box. To open the full view of your messages, simply follow this link https://www.facebook.com/messages 3. Open any message at https://www.facebook.com/messages, and you'll see the green Grammarly icon in your message's text field. I hope this helps, but please don't hesitate to contact me with any further questions or comments. Regards, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_no_icon_in_facebook_messages_instructions

[EXT. REINSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE RELEVANT BROWSER]

  2. Do you use the MixMax extension?

Browser Plugin::No Popup Editor in Google Docs Beta (Explain)Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly! Our beta doesn’t currently include the popup Grammarly Editor. Grammarly’s suggestions should appear as red underlines in your text. Please hover over an underline to accept the suggestion. For instance, if you write the sentence "I uses Grammarly" in a Google Doc, you should see a red underline to change “uses” to “use” the same way you would on any other site with the Grammarly browser extension enabled. If you have any other questions, just let me know and I’ll be happy to help. Kind regards, {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}browser_plugin_google_docs_beta_no_popup_editor, browser_plugin development
Browser Plugin::No Premium Checks in Google DocsHello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly! Grammarly for Google Docs is still in the beta stage at this time, which means that certain features (advanced suggestions) are not yet available. Although we’re working to resolve this, I don’t have an estimate for when we’ll be able to make advanced suggestions available. We know how important this feature is, but we don’t think it’s fair to our users to set expectations about timelines if we’re not positive that we can deliver when we say we will. In the meantime, we suggest you use our online Grammarly Editor at https://app.grammarly.com. Also at your disposal: the native (desktop) app and the Grammarly extension for your preferred browser. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused. We greatly appreciate your patience and understanding! Kind regards, {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}browser_plugin_no_premium_checks_in_google_docs, browser_plugin development
Browser Plugin::No Underlines Show in Google Docs

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue.


I wanted to let you know that our technical team is aware of the issue and they’re currently investigating it. Although we don’t have a timeline for resolving this yet, you can rest assured that we’re working to fix the issue as soon as possible.


In the meantime, please try following these steps:


  1. In the Google Docs toolbar, click Tools and hover over Spelling and grammar
  2. Make sure to enable both Show spelling suggestions and Show grammar suggestions
  3. Refresh the page


Hope that helps!


If you have any other questions, just let me know and I’ll be happy to help. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience.


Kind regards,

I can’t provide you with an estimated timeframe right now because the developers need some time to analyze the cause of the issue, but please rest assured that we won’t forget about it.


If your editing session will likely take more than 5-10 minutes, we recommend using the online Grammarly editor at https://app.grammarly.com or the desktop app (https://grammarly.com/native) to avoid experiencing this type of issue going forward.

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Browser Plugin::Safari::How to Reinstall

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support.


Reinstalling your Safari extension should resolve this issue. It’s quick and easy!


  1. Open Safari
  2. Go to Safari > Preferences
  3. Click Extensions
  4. Select Grammarly on the list
  5. Click Uninstall


To install the extension again, please visit https://safari-extensions.apple.com/details/?id=com.grammarly.spellchecker.extension-W8F64X92K3


I hope this helps, but please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Browser Plugin::Safari::How To UninstallHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, We apologize that Grammarly did not perform for you as expected. To disable or uninstall the Grammarly extension for Safari browser, please do the following: 1. Open Safari 2. Click on Safari tab -> Preferences... 3. Click "Extensions" 4. Uncheck the "Enabled" box to disable the plugin 5. If you'd like to uninstall the plugin forever, click the "Uninstall" button 6. Restart the browser Please feel free to contact me with any further questions or comments. Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin, browser_plugin_safari, browser_plugin_safari_uninstall
Browser Plugin::Safari::Issue with Installation (TS-1790)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for your message! I'm sorry that you're experiencing this issue.


To resolve the issue, please follow these steps:


1. Download the Grammarly extension for Safari at https://safari-extensions.apple.com/details/?id=com.grammarly.spellchecker.extension-W8F64X92K3

2. Close Safari by pressing Cmd + Q
3. Go to the Downloads folder, right-click the grammarly.safariextz file, hover the cursor over Open with and select Safari.

If this doesn't help, please grant your account the administrator status:

1. Open System Preferences > Users & Groups > choose your profile, then select Click the lock to make changes, use the administrator credentials, and click Allow user to administer this computer
2. Restart your computer and try installing the Grammarly extension again.


I hope this helps! Should you need any further assistance, please let me know.


Kindly,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin browser_plugin_safari development, browser_plugin_safari_issue_with_installation_ts1790
Browser Plugin::Safari::Key Features Are Missing/X or Wi-Fi Icon (TS-3109)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly! I'm happy to assist you today.


If the "key features are missing" message shows when you're using the Grammarly extension for Safari, please make sure that you are logged in to your Grammarly account at https://app.grammarly.com/. Once you've made sure that you are logged in to your account, the issue should cease.


If, however, the issue persists after you follow the instructions above, please follow the steps below:


For Safari 11 and newer:


1. Open Safari Preferences > Security and select Enable JavaScript

2. Open Safari Preferences > Privacy and uncheck Prevent cross-site tracking and Block all cookies

3. Go to Safari's Develop menu and ensure that Disable JavaScript and Disable Extensions are not selected.


Close Safari with Cmd + Q for the changes to take effect.


For Safari 10:


1. Open Safari Preferences > Privacy and select Allow from websites I visit (or Allow from all sites) in the Cookies and Website Data section

2. Open Safari Preferences > Security and select Enable JavaScript and Allow Plug-ins.


Close Safari with Cmd + Q for the changes to take effect.


I hope this helps, but please let me know if I can assist you further. We apologize for any inconvenience.


Sincerely,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}

browser_plugin development system_bug, browser_plugin_safari, browser_plugin_safari_key_features_missing_yellow_triangle_wifi_icon_issue
Browser Plugin::Salesforce Console Not SupportedHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for your message! It appears that the Salesforce console uses iFrame. Unfortunately, iFrame is not supported by Grammarly. We apologize for any inconvenience this might be causing. The good news is that our extension should work in all other text fields in Salesforce besides the console. I hope this information helps! Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you today. Best wishes, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development development_sent_to_development, browser_plugin_salesforce_console_not_supported
Browser Plugin::Take it!Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for reaching out! I'm happy to assist you today. Please feel free to contact us with any further questions or comments you may have. Kind regards, {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}browser_plugin_take_it, browser_plugin
Browser Plugin::Text Area Height IssueHi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for writing in today! I'm happy to assist you today. Currently, Grammarly does not initialize in text areas smaller than 38px in height. As a workaround, we suggest that you expand the text area by hitting Enter several times or dragging the lower right corner of the text area. We understand that this is definitely not an ideal solution, but please rest assured that the technical team is aware of the problem and we won’t forget about it. I’m going to close this ticket for now, but if you have any other questions about this or anything else, simply reply to this email, and the case will be reopened. Best wishes, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development_sent_to_development development, browser_plugin_text_area_height_limit_38
Browser Plugin::We Don't Recover Deleted Texts! REMOVE THE PART ABOUT GOOGLE DRIVE IF IT'S NOT RELEVANT Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thanks for reaching out! I'm sorry to hear about this issue. Unfortunately, we don’t have any way to recover this text for you, as Grammarly does not store this text after processing it to provide our services. Please note that using Ctrl+Z (Windows) or Cmd+Z (Mac) usually helps when you accidentally delete part of your text. If you need to recover a lost document on Google Drive, we suggest that you visit this article for more details: https://support.google.com/drive/answer/1716222?co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop&hl=en Thank you for understanding, and I’m sorry it’s not what you were hoping to hear. If you have any further questions or comments, just let me know. I'm here to help! Sincerely, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin donotsurvey, browser_plugin_text_not_saved_by_design
Browser Plugin::Why Other Non-English Spellcheckers Get Disabled?Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, Thank you for contacting Grammarly Support! I'm happy to assist you today. Grammarly supports only the English language at the moment. Because it's not available for other languages at this time, other spellcheckers get disabled while you are using Grammarly so that you don't get confused by different spellcheckers' underlines and highlights. If you would like to disable the Grammarly extension for certain websites, please click the green G icon on the toolbar and disable "Check for Grammar and Spelling". Feel free to enable the extension at any time. I hope this clarifies the matter for you, and we apologize for any inconvenience. Kindly, {{ticket.assignee.name}}browser_plugin development, browser_plugin_explain_why_non-english_spellcheckers_get_disabled
Business::Admin Counted as One Seat (Suggest Workaround)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for contacting Grammarly! I'm happy to assist you today.


At this time, the admin's account is a part of the license and is counted as one seat.


As a workaround, you can transfer your admin rights to your colleague. To do this, please sign in to the Grammarly website, navigate to the Admin panel, click on Administration, and choose Transfer admin permissions. Here is the direct link: https://admin-panel.grammarly.com/administration


You will be required to enter your password to confirm the transfer of admin permissions. You should receive a confirmation email from Grammarly shortly after the update.


Note: The email address should belong to an existing member of your team. If it's someone who is not on your team, please invite this member to your team first by following the instructions here: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000931852


Once your admin rights are transferred, you can ask the new admin to remove your account from the team. Please check this article for more information on how to do that: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000930532


I hope this helps, but don't hesitate to reach out for any further assistance.


Kind regards,


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

You’re welcome to apply for a new Business trial using the correct email address.

business, business_available_for_three_seats_and_more
Business::Business vs Premium (Differences)

Hi {{ticket.requester.name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly. I'm happy to answer this for you!


Both types of subscriptions grant access to all Grammarly Premium features. The key difference is that if you’re a Grammarly Business admin, you can also access the admin dashboard that allows you to manage your group subscription and track user statistics. Also, our human proofreading service is available to individual subscribers only.


I hope this clarifies the matter, but please let me know if you have any further questions or comments.


Kind regards,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}

Business::Cancel and Refund (Downgrade to Free - Voided)

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Grammarly!

As a courtesy, we have canceled your Business license and reversed the pending payment. Your funds should be released and made available to you soon.

Note: In most cases, the original pending payment will drop off of your bank statement, and a separate credit is not issued.

No further charges will be applied to your account. You are still very welcome to use the free version of Grammarly or otherwise upgrade to Grammarly Premium at https://grammarly.com/upgrade.


Upgrading to Grammarly Premium takes just a few simple steps:

  1. Log in to Grammarly.com with your email address {{ticket.requester.email}} and password.
  2. Click the Premium tab to the left
  3. Select your preferred plan
  4. Submit your billing information.


Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any additional questions, comments, or concerns.


Kindly,

No further charges will be applied to your account. You are still very welcome to use the free version of Grammarly or otherwise upgrade to Grammarly Premium at https://grammarly.com/upgrade.

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thanks for your message!


Per your request, I have refunded $___ USD to make it a monthly subscription for your team. Please note that it may take up to 10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your payment method.

Your Business subscription under {{ticket.requester.email}} will automatically renew on ____ at the rate of $___ USD/user unless you cancel it prior to the new billing cycle.

If you would like to cancel your subscription and use Grammarly for only one subscription period, please follow these instructions:

1. Go to https://admin-panel.grammarly.com/administration
2. Navigate to the Subscription tab
3. Click cancel your subscription at the bottom of the page
4. Click Complete cancellation

This will dissolve your Grammarly team at the end of the period you have already paid for. Cancellation permanently cancels all future payments, though you are welcome to upgrade back to Premium anytime you need us.

Please feel free to contact us with any other questions or concerns you may have.


Kindly,

"Except as may be expressly set forth herein, all Fees paid or accrued in connection with any Services are non-refundable, and Grammarly will not prorate any Fees paid for a subscription that is terminated before the end of its term."
